name: Love Rewind: A Magical Time Travel Romance
name_original: Love Rewind: A Magical Time Travel Romance
description:
A game for Nanoreno2020.

Summary:

Yuki had left human civilization a long time ago to live by himself in the woods. One day, saw a dying cat outside his cabin but couldn’t just leave it by itself like that. So he picked it up and nursed it back to health.

Turns out, the cat was actually a great spirit. It’s indebted to anyone who saves it, so it grants the human’s deepest desire.

That's how Yuki found himself back in at his college... 10 years ago.

Features:

- 12,000+ words (About an hour of playtime.)
- 2 love interests (One male, one female)
- 4 CGs
- 4 endings

Love Interests:

Quinn:
A shy and reserved student. When Yuki was a student, they were dating for quite a while. However, they split up over an unfortunate incident, leaving Yuki feeling lost and betrayed.

Zethe:
Yuki's biggest rival during his schooling. They never saw eye to eye about anything, and couldn't stop getting into altercations. Yuki loathed Zethe, but respected his abilities.
